title: Syrian refugee splashes into stardom
text:
Syrian refugee splashes into stardom 7:46am EDT - 01:38
Syrian swimmer Yusra Mardini talks about how she survived the dangerous crossing of the Mediterranean on a dinghy and shares her ambition to change perceptions about what it means to be a refugee with a new book and Hollywood film. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Syrian swimmer Yusra Mardini talks about how she survived the dangerous crossing of the Mediterranean on a dinghy and shares her ambition to change perceptions about what it means to be a refugee with a new book and Hollywood film.
